H0.text: Which US artist married Lee Krasner in 1945. Jackson Pollock

H1.text: Which US artist married Lee Krasner in 1945. Mark Rothko

H2.text: Which US artist married Lee Krasner in 1945. Willem de Kooning

H3.text: Which US artist married Lee Krasner in 1945. Pollockian

A4.text: In October 1945, Pollock and Krasner were married in a church with two witnesses present for the event.

A5.text: In 1945, Pollock and Krasner were married.
